title: Finding a Main
body:
I've been playing league for a while now and I've started playing ranked, landing myself in silver IV, as a top main but I haven't found any specific character that I can main for a decent amount of time. I started out with {{champion:86}} but wanted to try more interesting characters, so I then tried {{champion:23}}, {{champion:31}} and {{champion:58}} but still struggle to find someone worth playing. How exactly did you guys find your mains? 

-SSJMelon

replies.body: Stick with Cho'gath, probably the most OP top laner in the game and he snowballs so damn hard.
Gnar irelia rumble are all freelo
Just try a game or two of other top laners when they're on the free rotation (in normals i would suggest) and you can buy them if you feel like playing more after that

Depends what your after, a carry like champion, tanky, CC machine.

You want to win team fights (wukong, malphite) or win lane (darius,), or farm and destroy shit (jax, trynd)

what ever is the most fun to you, learning a champion is the most important part. I use to find making trynd work really hard, but now just rape in top most of the time, even a simple champ like him has so much depth.

> Even a simple champ like him has so much depth.

Deep.
